CSSAtan2.summary: The atan2() CSS function is a trigonometric function that returns the inverse tangent of two values between -infinity and infinity. The function accepts two arguments and returns the number of radians representing an {{cssxref("<angle>")}} between -180deg and 180deg.
CSSAtan2.returns: Given two values x and y, the function atan2(y, x) calculates and returns the {{cssxref("<angle>")}} between the positive x-axis and the ray from the origin to the point (x, y).
